summary: 18 new Terraform and Packer integrations from 16 partners provide more options to automate and secure cloud infrastructure management
title: New infrastructure integrations with GitHub, Illumio, Palo Alto Networks, Tessell, and more

summary:
We’re excited to announce that Aqara is bringing several of their devices to our Works with Home Assistant program.  We know that Aqara is a brand that many in the community like to recommend for its solid options for Zigbee and Matter. 
This will be the first partner to join since our recent update to the program, meaning it is the first to join certifying specific devices, making it much easier to see what will give you the best experience in Home Assistant...
title: Aqara joins Works with Home Assistant

summary: An old but persistent email scam known as "sextortion" has a new personalized touch: The missives, which claim that malware has captured webcam footage of recipients pleasuring themselves, now include a photo of the target's home in a bid to make threats about publishing the videos more frightening and convincing
title: Sextortion Scams Now Include Photos of Your Home

summary: Last week I asked if anyone had suggestions for a MagSafe car mount and I got a ton of recommendations.  Loads of love for Peak Design but I'm not paying that much just to hold my phone. title: MagSafe Miscellania

summary:
Three men in the United Kingdom have pleaded guilty to operating otp[. ]agency, a once popular online service that helped attackers intercept the one-time passcodes (OTPs) that many websites require as a second authentication factor in addition to passwords. 

Launched in November 2019, OTP Agency was a service for intercepting one-time passwords needed to log in to various websites...
title: Owners of 1-Time Passcode Theft Service Plead Guilty
